verse: Long ago God spoke to our ancestors by the prophets at different times and in different ways.
In these last days, he has spoken to us by his Son. God has appointed him heir of all things and made the universe through him.

The Son is the radiance of Godâ€™s glory and the exact expression of his nature, sustaining all things by his powerful word. After making purification for sins, he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high.
So he became superior to the angels, just as the name he inherited is more excellent than theirs.
For to which of the angels did he ever say,
Again, when he brings his firstborn into the world, he says,
And about the angels he says:
Now to which of the angels has he ever said:
Are they not all ministering spirits sent out to serve those who are going to inherit salvation?
